content.title: Python-based Image Recognition for Tree Canopies in RuneScape
content.description: Developed a highly accurate, real-time image recognition algorithm to identify tree canopies in the game RuneScape. This project served as an initial foray into image recognition, demonstrating proficiency in image manipulation and computer vision techniques. The algorithm successfully distinguishes tree canopies from other green elements in the game, highlighting them in real-time and providing clickable regions for interaction.

infoBoxes.title: Recognition
infoBoxes.content: All tree canopies, Distinct from grass and players

infoBoxes.title: Features
infoBoxes.content: Real-time processing, Canopy highlighting, Clickable regions

items.text: Demonstration of the algorithm showing the game window and a duplicate window with highlighted tree canopies and their IDs
